bt.torrent.fileselector

Class TorrentFileSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.torrent.fileselector.TorrentFileSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilePrioritySkipSelector
    Deprecated. 
    use FilePrioritySkipSelector

    public abstract class TorrentFileSelector
extends Object
implements FilePrioritySkipSelector
    Provides API for file selection (aka partial downloads).

    Currently there's a limitation that empty files will always be created (even if they weren't selected).

    Since:
    1.7
